You would be suprised how often Nobunaga is cast as a demon-type
villain in=
 anime and video games.  Or just a villain in general.  

Nagashino was a t=
actical brilliance that revolutionized warfare, but a
*lot* of folks didnt =
think it was to honorable.  Plus he was a little
taken with being eccentric=
 and anything foreign.  Many saw him as the
downfall of society if he had r=
uled Japan.  

Madman, Genius, same thing :)  
-Jason
